name: US Sales Tax Rate By Zipcode
title: US Sales Tax Rate By Zipcode
tool_name: US Sales Tax Rate By Zipcode

api_list.name: salestax_rate
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://us-sales-tax-rate-by-zipcode1.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "us-sales-tax-rate-by-zipcode1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
